# mixed

**Type Property**

A constant value that indicates a control is in a mixed state, neither on nor off.

## Declaration

```swift
static let mixed: NSControl.StateValue
```

## Discussion

For example, if a checkbox displays the state of more than one selected row in a table and the items have different states, then the checkbox’s state is mixed.

## Setting a Control’s State

- **on**: A constant value that indicates a control is on or selected.
- **off**: A constant value that indicates a control is off or unselected.

items.description: A constant value that indicates a control is on or selected.
items.name: on

items.description: A constant value that indicates a control is off or unselected.
items.name: off

title: mixed
